secondary_street_name: Sloane Street, Basil Street (above Knightsbridge Station)
description: Demolition of 33-35 Brompton Road; partial demolition of 4a/5 Sloane Street at basement, ground and first floor level and partial demolition of nos. 1-9 Brompton Road and 1-3 Sloane Street, 13-27 Brompton Road and 2-8 Basil Street, 29-31 Brompton Road and 10-14 Basil Street behind retained facades. Redevelopment of Site to provide retail use, office, residential and restaurant use in a part seven, part eight storey building above three storey basement level. Relocation of existing London Underground entrance; creation of space to facilitate provision of a new step-free London Underground entrance on Hooper's Court; together with amenity space, public realm enhancements, plant, car parking, servicing and access works, electricity sub-station and other associated works. (MAJOR APPLICATION)
